title: SOLD T206 lot, large pic. x 135
author: Ladder7

posts.post_title: SOLD T206 lot, large pic. x 135
posts.post_content:
Okay, same as the last. VG asst, crease-free. There may be a wrinkle or two, but I'll do my best to make sure the backs are clean. Some minors and hofs tossed in. No bad surprises here.


Emails only, Not snubbing you guys., Just that the Droid doesn't like the internal PM thingy here. Ask for a larger scan!

Gracie, Steve F

PayPal, cashiers, bank or Postal MO please;

[url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

*Someone mentioned there were two Hal Chase-blue. I will replace it with a better card (hof)*

[IMG]http://i30.photobucket.com/albums/c327/oche16/The%20Jane%20Collection/135ctT206VGHOFlot.jpg[/IMG]
can you pleeeeease sell some of these individually for us that cant afford lots :)

Sean, I have lesser lots coming. It may take a few days. 

This money goes towards the nursing care of the elderly owner. So, save your pennies!
Cool! Looking forward to seeing them :)

Steve-I am an infrequent poster on here but I had to ask, as I am sure many others are wondering, what the story was behind this large find of T and E cards? I love hearing the story behind these finds as interesting as owning the cards themselves.

Bob
